subject: CBSNews.com News Alert! TB Patient Taken To Denver; ID Revealed
body:
CBS News has learned the tuberculosis patient under the first federal 
quarantine since 1963 is Andrew Harley Speaker, a 31-year-old lawyer from 
Atlanta. He has been taken to a hospital in Denver which specializes in 
respiratory disorders.

Log on now to www.cbsnews.com, or wap.cbsnews.com for wireless users, for details. 

Wireless photo and video alerts from CBSNews.com, direct to your phone. Subscribe now at http://www.cbsnews.com/htdocs/wireless/index.php.
